examples: it was replaced because of its age

definitions.text: an era of history having some distinctive feature
examples: we live in a litigious age

definitions.text: a time of life (usually defined in years) at which some particular qualification or power arises
examples: she was now of school age
we've known each other for ages
I haven't been there for years and years
old age is not for sissies
age hasn't slowed him down at all

definitions.text: begin to seem older; get older
examples: The death of his wife caused him to age fast
we age every day--what a depressing thought!
The death of his child aged him tremendously
